— 

Welcome to Neon Dogde... My new game, which is recently an Alpha. Why? Because I was having trouble with some magic potions I wanted to add... and then XD. The Complete Version will be probably out tomorrow or... next week? Depending on the time I have. 

— 

Instructions: 

» Move with arrows keys, wasd, or mobile friendly! 

» Shooting: Spacebar 
» You can kill: The circles 

» You can't kill: Squares / Rectangles
» Goal: Avoid flying obstacles and get the highscore!
